name: places/ChIJ6z6ZgPdYwokR9JkXsIpfrRI
formattedAddress: 145 W 55th St, 068 76 mi #1, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 145 W 55th St, 068 76 mi #1, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Antonietta gave me the best hair cut, color and style I have ever had!  I was referred to Dario's by the Hilton Hotel concierge, and took a chance on pampering myself while on vacation in NYC.  Antonietta's service was impeccable!  I got the day and time that worked best for me and was cheerfully greeted when I walked in the door!  She was easy to talk to, and clearly has experience, as the style she gave me was easy and fits with my lifestyle.  The color she chose for my hair complemented my skin tone very well and was very high quality (it covered the grays very nicely!)  What surprised me the most was that I truly felt like I was the center of the universe the entire time I was in her chair.  Never once was she distracted, or took her focus off of me.  You can be sure that every time I go to NYC, I wll be making an appointment with Antonietta at Dario's!

originalText.text: Really enjoy coming into this Salon the Owner Dario is super friendly, great atmosphere! My colorist Gloria is amazing, always does a great job and is so friendly! Mikio cuts my hair and I'm 100 percent satisfied each time! Igor is the salons assistant, sweetest guy ever and gives wonderful scalp massages! I highly recommend this Salon and will definetely recommend to my friends and family!

originalText.text: A girlfriend and I visited New York for the first time last October and we decided we wanted a haircut in that city. After looking at a few Salons, we happened upon Dario in West 55th Street and decided there and then to have our hair done there as it had a good 'vibe'.  The service was fabulous, the price reasonable so had my haircut and colored by Germano (he was Sicilian) and my friend just had a cut, wow what a fabulous job he did. He was really a true artist and knew his stuff.

originalText.text: Just had a haircut and highlights with Antoinetta last night. She's very honest about what will look good and what will be very high maintenance to achieve, which I appreciated. The highlights were fantastic!!! I will definitely start seeing her on a regular basis. She also made me a delicious shot of espresso.

text.text: Just had a haircut and highlights with Antoinetta last night. She's very honest about what will look good and what will be very high maintenance to achieve, which I appreciated. The highlights were fantastic!!! I will definitely start seeing her on a regular basis. She also made me a delicious shot of espresso.

originalText.text:
I called to make and appointment for a long haircut and they told me it costs $55. I went in and the guy didn’t know how to cut my hair the way I asked (showed him a photo of my previous haircut) so I told him to give me a simple, straight haircut. After I was done he wanted to charge me $88. I reminded him I called earlier and he confirmed the $55 over the phone. He said that amount was for guys only.
Not to mention the dirty conditions they work in. The hair brush he was using was full of other people’s hair, totally disgusting.
